#!/bin/bash
# DB Backup Tool Installation - Enhanced mit Git Backup

set -e

declare -r DIR="/mnt/server"
declare -r APP_DIR="${DIR}/db-backup-tool"

# Fest definiertes Repository - keine Benutzer-Konfiguration mehr n√∂tig
REPO_URL="https://github.com/brandy2307/db-backup-tool.git"
REPO_BRANCH="main"

echo "================================="
echo "DB BACKUP TOOL INSTALLATION (Enhanced)"
echo "================================="
echo "Offizielles Repository: ${REPO_URL}"
echo "Branch: ${REPO_BRANCH}"
echo "Target: ${APP_DIR}"
echo "Features: Auto-Update + Git Backup Integration"
echo "================================="

# System Dependencies installieren
echo "[1/6] Installing system dependencies..."
apt update
apt install -y wget curl gnupg2 software-properties-common git

# Node.js installieren
echo "[2/6] Installing Node.js..."
curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_18.x | bash -
apt install -y nodejs

# Database Tools installieren
echo "[3/6] Installing database tools..."
apt install -y mysql-client || apt install -y default-mysql-client || echo "MySQL client failed"
apt install -y postgresql-client || apt install -y postgresql-client-common || echo "PostgreSQL client failed"

# MongoDB Tools
echo "Installing MongoDB tools..."
curl -fsSL https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-7.0.asc | gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/mongodb-server-7.0.gpg
echo "deb [ arch=amd64,arm64 signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/mongodb-server-7.0.gpg ] https://repo.mongodb.org/apt/debian bookworm/mongodb-org/7.0 main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mongodb-org-7.0.list
apt update
apt install -y mongodb-database-tools || echo "MongoDB tools failed"

# Git konfigurieren (f√ºr Backup Repository)
echo "[4/6] Configuring Git for backup repositories..."
git config --global init.defaultBranch main
git config --global user.name "DB Backup Tool"
git config --global user.email "backup@localhost"

# Tools verifikation
echo "[5/6] Verifying tools..."
echo "Node.js: $(node --version)"
echo "NPM: $(npm --version)"
echo "Git: $(git --version)"

# Wechsel zum Zielverzeichnis
cd "${DIR}"

# Alte Installation entfernen
if [ -d "${APP_DIR}" ]; then
    echo "Removing old installation..."
    rm -rf "${APP_DIR}"
fi

# Repository Setup
echo "[6/6] Setting up official repository..."
echo "Cloning from official repository: ${REPO_URL}"

# Test Repository-Zugriff
if ! git ls-remote --heads "${REPO_URL}" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "ERROR: Official repository '${REPO_URL}' is not accessible!"
    echo "This might be a temporary network issue. Please try again later."
    exit 1
fi

# Test Branch-Existenz
if ! git ls-remote --heads "${REPO_URL}" | grep -q "refs/heads/${REPO_BRANCH}$"; then
    echo "ERROR: Branch '${REPO_BRANCH}' does not exist in official repository!"
    echo "Available branches:"
    git ls-remote --heads "${REPO_URL}" | sed 's/.*refs\/heads\///'
    exit 1
fi

# Repository klonen
echo "Cloning official repository..."
if ! git clone -b "${REPO_BRANCH}" "${REPO_URL}" "${APP_DIR}"; then
    echo "ERROR: Git clone from official repository failed!"
    exit 1
fi

# Verifikation nach Clone
cd "${APP_DIR}"
echo "Official repository cloned successfully to: $(pwd)"
echo "Contents:"
ls -la

# Pr√ºfe kritische Dateien
if [ ! -f "package.json" ]; then
    echo "ERROR: package.json not found in official repository!"
    echo "This indicates a problem with the official repository."
    exit 1
fi

if [ ! -f "server.js" ]; then
    echo "ERROR: server.js not found in official repository!"
    echo "This indicates a problem with the official repository."
    exit 1
fi

# Validiere package.json
if ! node -e "JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('package.json', 'utf8'))"; then
    echo "ERROR: package.json from official repository is invalid JSON!"
    exit 1
fi

echo "‚úì All required files found and valid from official repository"

# Dependencies installieren
echo "Installing dependencies..."
npm cache clean --force
if ! npm install --production; then
    echo "Trying with legacy-peer-deps..."
    npm install --production --legacy-peer-deps
fi

# Verzeichnisse erstellen
echo "Creating directories..."
mkdir -p backups logs config public

# Config erstellen (falls nicht vorhanden) - Enhanced mit Git Backup
if [ ! -f "config.json" ]; then
    echo "Creating enhanced config.json with Git Backup support..."
    cat > config.json << EOF
{
  "server": {
    "port": 8080,
    "host": "0.0.0.0",
    "httpsPort": 8443
  },
  "security": {
    "sessionSecret": "change-this-secret-key-in-production",
    "jwtSecret": "change-this-jwt-secret-in-production",
    "defaultAdmin": {
      "username": "admin",
      "password": "admin123"
    },
    "requireHttps": false,
    "enable2FA": false,
    "strongPasswords": true,
    "maxFailedAttempts": 5
  },
  "backup": {
    "defaultPath": "./backups",
    "maxBackups": 10,
    "compression": true
  },
  "logging": {
    "level": "info",
    "file": "./logs/app.log"
  },
  "updates": {
    "autoUpdate": true,
    "repository": "${REPO_URL}",
    "branch": "${REPO_BRANCH}"
  },
  "gitBackup": {
    "enabled": false,
    "repository": "",
    "username": "",
    "branch": "main"
  }
}
EOF
fi

# Update-Script erstellen (mit fest definierten Repository-Daten)
cat > update.sh << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
# Auto-Update Script f√ºr offizielles Repository - Enhanced Version

set -e

# Fest definierte Repository-Daten
REPO_URL="https://github.com/brandy2307/db-backup-tool.git"
REPO_BRANCH="main"

echo "================================="
echo "üîÑ DB BACKUP TOOL AUTO-UPDATE (Enhanced)"
echo "================================="
echo "üì¶ Offizielles Repository: ${REPO_URL}"
echo "üîó Branch: ${REPO_BRANCH}"
echo "üìÅ Verzeichnis: $(pwd)"
echo "üéØ Features: Auto-Update + Git Backup"
echo "================================="

# Funktion: Berechtigungen setzen
fix_permissions() {
    echo "üîß Setze korrekte Berechtigungen..."
    
    # Hauptverzeichnis
    chmod 755 . 2>/dev/null || true
    
    # Ausf√ºhrbare Dateien
    chmod +x update.sh 2>/dev/null || true
    chmod +x server.js 2>/dev/null || true
    
    # Konfigurationsdateien (lesbar/schreibbar)
    chmod 644 *.json 2>/dev/null || true
    chmod 644 *.js 2>/dev/null || true
    chmod 644 *.md 2>/dev/null || true
    
    # Verzeichnisse (ausf√ºhrbar f√ºr Navigation)
    chmod 755 backups 2>/dev/null || true
    chmod 755 logs 2>/dev/null || true
    chmod 755 config 2>/dev/null || true
    chmod 755 public 2>/dev/null || true
    
    # Frontend-Dateien
    chmod 644 public/*.html 2>/dev/null || true
    chmod 644 public/*.css 2>/dev/null || true
    chmod 644 public/*.js 2>/dev/null || true
    
    # Git-Dateien
    chmod 644 .gitattributes 2>/dev/null || true
    
    # NPM/Node-spezifische Dateien
    chmod 644 package*.json 2>/dev/null || true
    
    echo "‚úÖ Berechtigungen gesetzt"
}

# Pr√ºfe ob wir in einem Git Repository sind
if [ ! -d ".git" ]; then
    echo "‚ùå Kein Git Repository gefunden!"
    echo "‚ÑπÔ∏è  Bitte f√ºhre eine Neuinstallation durch"
    exit 1
fi

# Pr√ºfe ob das Repository das offizielle ist
CURRENT_REPO=$(git remote get-url origin 2>/dev/null || echo "unknown")
if [ "$CURRENT_REPO" != "$REPO_URL" ]; then
    echo "‚ö†Ô∏è  Repository-URL stimmt nicht √ºberein!"
    echo "   Aktuell: $CURRENT_REPO"
    echo "   Erwartet: $REPO_URL"
    echo "üîÑ Aktualisiere Remote-URL..."
    git remote set-url origin "$REPO_URL"
fi

# Backup wichtiger Konfigurationsdateien
echo "üíæ Sichere Konfigurationsdateien..."
BACKUP_DIR="./temp_backup_$(date +%s)"
mkdir -p "$BACKUP_DIR"

# Backup der wichtigsten Dateien
if [ -f "config.json" ]; then
    cp config.json "$BACKUP_DIR/config.json"
    echo "‚úÖ config.json gesichert"
fi

if [ -f "backups/schedules.json" ]; then
    cp backups/schedules.json "$BACKUP_DIR/schedules.json"
    echo "‚úÖ schedules.json gesichert"
fi

# Backup des kompletten backups-Ordners (falls vorhanden und nicht leer)
if [ -d "backups" ] && [ "$(ls -A backups 2>/dev/null)" ]; then
    cp -r backups "$BACKUP_DIR/backups_folder" 2>/dev/null || true
    echo "‚úÖ Backup-Ordner gesichert (inkl. Git Backup Repository)"
fi

# Backup von benutzerdefinierten Frontend-Dateien (falls vorhanden)
if [ -f "public/custom.css" ]; then
    cp public/custom.css "$BACKUP_DIR/custom.css"
    echo "‚úÖ Benutzerdefinierte CSS-Datei gesichert"
fi

if [ -f "public/custom.js" ]; then
    cp public/custom.js "$BACKUP_DIR/custom.js"
    echo "‚úÖ Benutzerdefinierte JS-Datei gesichert"
fi

# Git Update vom offiziellen Repository
echo "üîç Pr√ºfe auf Updates..."
git fetch origin

# Hole aktuelle Commit-Hashes
LOCAL=$(git rev-parse HEAD)
REMOTE=$(git rev-parse origin/$REPO_BRANCH)

if [ "$LOCAL" != "$REMOTE" ]; then
    echo "üîÑ Update verf√ºgbar! Aktualisiere..."
    echo "   Von: $(git rev-parse --short HEAD)"
    echo "   Zu:  $(git rev-parse --short origin/$REPO_BRANCH)"
    
    # Stash lokale √Ñnderungen (falls vorhanden)
    git stash push -m "Auto-stash before update $(date)" 2>/dev/null || true
    
    # Hard reset zum neuesten Stand
    git reset --hard origin/$REPO_BRANCH
    
    # Berechtigungen sofort nach Git-Update setzen
    fix_permissions
    
    # Dependencies aktualisieren
    echo "üì¶ Aktualisiere Dependencies..."
    npm cache clean --force 2>/dev/null || true
    
    # NPM install mit verschiedenen Fallback-Optionen
    if npm install --production --omit=dev; then
        echo "‚úÖ Dependencies mit --omit=dev installiert"
    elif npm install --production --legacy-peer-deps; then
        echo "‚úÖ Dependencies mit --legacy-peer-deps installiert"
    elif npm install --production; then
        echo "‚úÖ Dependencies installiert"
    else
        echo "‚ö†Ô∏è  Dependency-Installation fehlgeschlagen - fahre trotzdem fort"
    fi
    
    # Verzeichnisse sicherstellen
    mkdir -p backups logs config public
    
    # Konfigurationsdateien wiederherstellen
    echo "üîÑ Stelle Konfigurationsdateien wieder her..."
    
    if [ -f "$BACKUP_DIR/config.json" ]; then
        mv "$BACKUP_DIR/config.json" config.json
        echo "‚úÖ config.json wiederhergestellt"
    fi
    
    if [ -f "$BACKUP_DIR/schedules.json" ]; then
        mv "$BACKUP_DIR/schedules.json" backups/schedules.json
        echo "‚úÖ schedules.json wiederhergestellt"
    fi
    
    # Backup-Ordner wiederherstellen (inklusive Git Backup Repository)
    if [ -d "$BACKUP_DIR/backups_folder" ]; then
        echo "üîÑ Stelle Backup-Ordner wieder her..."
        # Sichere Git Backup Repository falls vorhanden
        if [ -d "$BACKUP_DIR/backups_folder/git-backup" ]; then
            echo "üì¶ Git Backup Repository gefunden - wird wiederhergestellt"
        fi
        
        # Kopiere kompletten Backup-Ordner
        cp -r "$BACKUP_DIR/backups_folder/"* backups/ 2>/dev/null || true
        echo "‚úÖ Backup-Ordner wiederhergestellt (inkl. Git Repository)"
    fi
    
    # Benutzerdefinierte Frontend-Dateien wiederherstellen
    if [ -f "$BACKUP_DIR/custom.css" ]; then
        mv "$BACKUP_DIR/custom.css" public/custom.css
        echo "‚úÖ Benutzerdefinierte CSS-Datei wiederhergestellt"
    fi
    
    if [ -f "$BACKUP_DIR/custom.js" ]; then
        mv "$BACKUP_DIR/custom.js" public/custom.js
        echo "‚úÖ Benutzerdefinierte JS-Datei wiederhergestellt"
    fi
    
    # Frontend-Dateien pr√ºfen
    echo "üé® Pr√ºfe Frontend-Dateien..."
    
    FRONTEND_FILES=(
        "public/index.html"
        "public/styles.css"
        "public/app.js"
    )
    
    MISSING_FILES=()
    for file in "${FRONTEND_FILES[@]}"; do
        if [ ! -f "$file" ]; then
            MISSING_FILES+=("$file")
        fi
    done
    
    if [ ${#MISSING_FILES[@]} -gt 0 ]; then
        echo "‚ö†Ô∏è  Fehlende Frontend-Dateien erkannt:"
        for file in "${MISSING_FILES[@]}"; do
            echo "   - $file"
        done
        echo "‚ÑπÔ∏è  F√ºhre 'git reset --hard origin/main' aus, falls Dateien fehlen"
    else
        echo "‚úÖ Alle Frontend-Dateien vorhanden (Enhanced Version)"
    fi
    
    # Finale Berechtigungsreparatur nach dem gesamten Update
    fix_permissions
    
    echo "‚úÖ Update erfolgreich abgeschlossen!"
    echo "üìã Neue Version: $(git rev-parse --short HEAD)"
    echo "üìÖ Commit-Datum: $(git log -1 --format=%ci)"
    echo "üéØ Features: Auto-Update + Git Backup Integration"
    
else
    echo "‚úÖ Bereits auf dem neuesten Stand!"
    echo "üìã Aktuelle Version: $(git rev-parse --short HEAD)"
    
    # Auch bei "kein Update" die Berechtigungen reparieren
    echo "üîß Repariere Berechtigungen (Wartung)..."
    fix_permissions
fi

# Cleanup der tempor√§ren Backup-Dateien
echo "üßπ R√§ume tempor√§re Dateien auf..."
rm -rf "$BACKUP_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true

# Zeige aktuelle Installation
echo "================================="
echo "üìä AKTUELLE INSTALLATION (Enhanced)"
echo "================================="
echo "Repository: $(git remote get-url origin)"
echo "Branch: $(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo "main")"
echo "Commit: $(git rev-parse --short HEAD)"
echo "Datum: $(git log -1 --format=%ci 2>/dev/null || echo "Unknown")"
echo "Node.js: $(node --version 2>/dev/null || echo "Unknown")"
echo "NPM: $(npm --version 2>/dev/null || echo "Unknown")"
echo ""
echo "üìÅ Dateistruktur:"
echo "‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ server.js $([ -f "server.js" ] && echo "‚úÖ" || echo "‚ùå")"
echo "‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ package.json $([ -f "package.json" ] && echo "‚úÖ" || echo "‚ùå")"
echo "‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ config.json $([ -f "config.json" ] && echo "‚úÖ" || echo "‚ùå")"
echo "‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ update.sh $([ -f "update.sh" ] && echo "‚úÖ" || echo "‚ùå") $([ -x "update.sh" ] && echo "(üîì)" || echo "(üîí)")"

echo "    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ styles.css $([ -f "public/styles.css" ] && echo "‚úÖ" || echo "‚ùå")"
echo "    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ app.js $([ -f "public/app.js" ] && echo "‚úÖ" || echo "‚ùå")"
echo "    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ custom.css $([ -f "public/custom.css" ] && echo "üìù" || echo "‚ö™")"
echo "    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ custom.js $([ -f "public/custom.js" ] && echo "üìù" || echo "‚ö™")"
echo ""
echo "üìÇ Verzeichnisse:"

echo "‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ git-backup/ $([ -d "backups/git-backup" ] && echo "üì¶ (Git Repository)" || echo "‚ö™ (Nicht initialisiert)")"
echo "‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ logs/ $([ -d "logs" ] && echo "‚úÖ" || echo "‚ùå")"
echo "‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ config/ $([ -d "config" ] && echo "‚úÖ" || echo "‚ùå")"

echo "üîß Verf√ºgbare Tools:"

echo "‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ npm: $(command -v npm >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo "‚úÖ" || echo "‚ùå")"
